In this lab, we are going to visualize the monthly fluctuation in stock prices. make a scatter plot of closing value versus month and add mean and quantiles for each month to see the fluctuations.

## Libraries

Load the necessary libraries.

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data

Use the data from the Facebook dataset.

```{r data}
df_fb <- read_csv("../../data/FB.csv")
df_fb$Date <- as.Date(df_fb$Date)
df_fb$Month <- strftime(df_fb$Date, "%m")
df_fb$Month <- as.numeric(df_fb$Month)
df_fb <- df_fb %>% filter ((Date >= "2017-05-01") & (Date < "2018-05-01"))
```
